name: Effiosoft
description:
Based in Bucharest, Romania, Effiosoft specializes in mobile app development for the most popular platforms: iOS and Android. With a solid background in programming, our team can develop apps from scratch, implement updates for published apps, audit the source code and refactor/optimize.
Alongside mobile app development, we are happy to provide server backend implementation.
When needed, we will provide stunning graphic mockups created in Photoshop. Our artists’ experience comes from game development.
